FuncDef: The display scp-client command displays all the current SCP client configurations.
Examples: The source address of the SCP client is 1.1.1.1.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the source IP address of an SCP client is set, you can run the display scp-client command to view the configuration. If scp client-source is not configured, the SCP client's source IP address is 0.0.0.0 by default.
